long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple, secure and smart self-custody wallet with a one of a kind marketplace of 1-click automations. 

Modular architecture of Unhosted Smart Accounts can perform even the most sophisticated strategies, providing a programmability level absent in EOAs.

Our Permissionless on-Chain Factory ensures the immutability of developer fees allowing anyone to deploy their strategy and add it to their wallet.

Unhosted modules facilitate automated interaction with other smart contracts on behalf of the user, unlocking 100's of custom solutions.
